title: More on the Shroud of Turin Relic on eBay
post: In fact, it looks genuine (especially the writing). Sainte Thérèse would be of course for Teresa of Avila (many relics of Teresa are scattered across Europe) !
author: Cazab

title: More on the Shroud of Turin Relic on eBay
post: However “saint suaire” could also be for the “saint suaire de Besançon” or the “saint suaire de Compiègne”
author: Cazab
